welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Wilmington Island, where southern charm meets coastal beauty. Get ready to explore our quaint town, known for its pristine beaches and charming local shops. We hope you enjoy your stay and soak up all that our city has to offer!"

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hunter AAF Airport serves commercial and military flights.

terminals.name: Military Terminal
terminals.description: The military terminal at Hunter AAF Airport caters to military personnel and their families.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Savannah/Hilton Head Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is a smaller terminal at Savannah/Hilton Head Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hilton Head Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the airport. No password is required.
